summary: This is an email from a contractor to an unspecified recipient, forwarding a query from ABC News reporter Aaron Katersky. Katersky is inquiring about a rumor that Jeffrey Epstein committed suicide the previous night (August 9, 2019).

persons.name: Aaron Katersky
persons.context: ABC News reporter who called a contractor to inquire about a rumor that Jeffrey Epstein had committed suicide.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the suicide rumor being investigated by ABC News.

events.title: Rumored Suicide of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: ABC News reporter Aaron Katersky is investigating a rumor that Jeffrey Epstein committed suicide the previous night.

keyFacts: On August 10, 2019, ABC News reporter Aaron Katersky was actively investigating a rumor that Jeffrey Epstein had committed suicide the night before.
The information was being sought from a contractor who had been on vacation.
The email suggests the rumor of Epstein's death was circulating in media circles before an official announcement.
